name: Royal Snowball Fight
description:
Royal Snowball Fight

Winter came to Royal Kingdom. And it's time for Royal Snowball Fight!

See how many points can you score. Fight against goblins, King and Queen!

Controls:

For Keyboard:

WASD (or arrow keys) - move

spacebar - shoot snowball

For Gamepad:

Left Stick - move

X (or Square) - shoot snowball

ESC - to quit the game

Made in 7 hours total for Mini Jam 42. Theme: Snow. Limitation: Your game must only use 2 colors

Font and sprites by Kenney
